command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

command.name: create
command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.customRules" options="custom-rules" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.customRules[].matchConditions" options="match-conditions" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.customRules[].matchConditions[].matchValues" options="match-values" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.customRules[].matchConditions[].matchVariables" options="match-variables" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.customRules[].matchConditions[].transforms" options="transforms">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.managedRules.exclusions" options="exclusions">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.managedRules.exclusions[].exclusionManagedRuleSets" options="exclusion-managed-rule-sets">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.managedRules.exclusions[].exclusionManagedRuleSets[].ruleGroups" options="rule-groups">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.managedRules.exclusions[].exclusionManagedRuleSets[].ruleGroups[].rules" options="rules">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.managedRules.managedRuleSets" options="managed-rule-sets" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.managedRules.managedRuleSets[].ruleGroupOverrides" options="rule-group-overrides">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.managedRules.managedRuleSets[].ruleGroupOverrides[].rules" options="rules">

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="customRules" arg="$parameters.properties.customRules">
<prop type="array" name="matchConditions" arg="$parameters.properties.customRules[].matchConditions" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="matchValues" arg="$parameters.properties.customRules[].matchConditions[].matchValues" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="matchVariables" arg="$parameters.properties.customRules[].matchConditions[].matchVariables" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="transforms" arg="$parameters.properties.customRules[].matchConditions[].transforms">
<prop type="array" name="exclusions" arg="$parameters.properties.managedRules.exclusions">
<prop type="array" name="exclusionManagedRuleSets" arg="$parameters.properties.managedRules.exclusions[].exclusionManagedRuleSets">
<prop type="array" name="ruleGroups" arg="$parameters.properties.managedRules.exclusions[].exclusionManagedRuleSets[].ruleGroups">
<prop type="array" name="rules" arg="$parameters.properties.managedRules.exclusions[].exclusionManagedRuleSets[].ruleGroups[].rules">
<prop type="array" name="managedRuleSets" arg="$parameters.properties.managedRules.managedRuleSets" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="ruleGroupOverrides" arg="$parameters.properties.managedRules.managedRuleSets[].ruleGroupOverrides">
<prop type="array" name="rules" arg="$parameters.properties.managedRules.managedRuleSets[].ruleGroupOverrides[].rules">

command.name: update
command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.customRules" options="custom-rules" group="Properties">

<prop type="array" name="matchConditions" arg="$parameters.properties.customRules[].matchConditions" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="matchValues" arg="$parameters.properties.customRules[].matchConditions[].matchValues" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="matchVariables" arg="$parameters.properties.customRules[].matchConditions[].matchVariables" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="transforms" arg="$parameters.properties.customRules[].matchConditions[].transforms">
<prop type="array" name="exclusions" arg="$parameters.properties.managedRules.exclusions">
<prop type="array" name="exclusionManagedRuleSets" arg="$parameters.properties.managedRules.exclusions[].exclusionManagedRuleSets">
<prop type="array" name="ruleGroups" arg="$parameters.properties.managedRules.exclusions[].exclusionManagedRuleSets[].ruleGroups">
<prop type="array" name="rules" arg="$parameters.properties.managedRules.exclusions[].exclusionManagedRuleSets[].ruleGroups[].rules">
<prop type="array" name="managedRuleSets" arg="$parameters.properties.managedRules.managedRuleSets" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="ruleGroupOverrides" arg="$parameters.properties.managedRules.managedRuleSets[].ruleGroupOverrides">
<prop type="array" name="rules" arg="$parameters.properties.managedRules.managedRuleSets[].ruleGroupOverrides[].rules">

help.short: If the action type is block, customer can override the response body. The body must be specified in base64 encoding.
If the action type is block, customer can override the response status code.
Maximum file upload size in Mb for WAF.
Maximum request body size in Kb for WAF.
Whether to allow WAF to check request Body.

help.short: Name of the web application firewall policy.
If the action type is block, customer can override the response body. The body must be specified in base64 encoding.
If the action type is block, customer can override the response status code.
Maximum file upload size in Mb for WAF.
Maximum request body size in Kb for WAF.
If it is in detection mode or prevention mode at policy level.
Specified to require WAF to check request body.
If the policy is in enabled state or disabled state.
